channel.title: God of Blogs | Willie Liwa Johnson
channel.description: A professional journal dedicated to the exploration of Divine Love, the complexities of Life, and the Sovereignty of God.

item.title: The Mathematics of Faith
item.description: Exploring the divine precision of the universe and why logic points toward a Creator.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: The Grace of New Beginnings
item.description: How the divine gift of mercy allows us to reset our lives every single morning.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: The Defense of Light
item.description: How to stand firm in the Truth with grace and clarity in a skeptical world.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: Love as a Universal Language
item.description: Participating in the very nature of God through the fundamental frequency of Love.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: Understanding Divine Patience
item.description: Why waiting is not a system error, but a vital part of spiritual character development.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: The Sovereignty of the Creator
item.description: Exploring the mathematical and spiritual evidence of a Divine Architect in all of creation.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: The Eternal Nature of Love
item.description: Reflecting on the divine origin of love and its power to transform our lives.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)

item.title: The Beauty of a Life Surrendered
item.description: Finding peace and purpose by aligning our will with the Divine.
item.author: willie@godofblogs.xyz (Willie Liwa Johnson)
